mapper.select: select id,bid,uid,createtime from ims_ewei_shop_sns_board_follow where bid = #{bid} and uid =#{uid}
mapper.delete: delete from ims_ewei_shop_sns_board_follow where bid = #{bid} and openid = #{uid}
mapper.select: select bf.id,m.avatar,m.nickname,m.level,b.levelname from ims_ewei_shop_sns_board_follow bf LEFT JOIN ims_ewei_shop_member m ON bf.uid = m.uid LEFT JOIN ims_ewei_shop_member_level b ON m.level = b.level where bf.bid = #{zhuquanzi}
